在四五十年代，一种叫做“脑叶切除术”(lobotomy)的手术盛行美国。这种手术以破坏或摘除大脑的某一部分为手段，通常用来治疗有精神病的人。那时候的医生们对.

entry.tran: 叶切断术；前脑叶白质切除术
entry.def: A lobotomy is a surgical operation in which some of the nerves in the brain are cut in order to treat severe mental illness.

means.word_mean: 1. surgical interruption of nerve tracts to and from the frontal lobe of the brain; often results in marked cognitive and personality changes
